page.title: 13STRAWBERRY GROWING
page.content: THE VILLAGE OF NORTH WHEATLEY IS WELL KNOWN LOCALLY AS THE PRODUCER OF STRAWBERRIES. FOR SIX WEEKS EACH SUMMER THE VILLAGE IS A HIVE OF ACTIVITY AS RESIDENTS,ADULTS AND CHILDREN ALIKE,SPEND TIME STRAWBERRY PICKING. THE MOST POPULAR VARIETIES OF STRAWBERRY GROWN ARE THE CAMBRIDGE FAVOURITE AND THE HAPIL.THE PLANTS HAVE A LIFE SPAN OFN FIVE YEARS AND AFTER THE FIRST YEAR HAVE TO BE PROTECTED FROM THE FROST AS THESE PROVIDE THE CROP WHICH IS TO SOLD BOTH LOCALLY AND NATIONALLY. THE GROWING SEASON DEPENDS ON THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF SUN AND RAIN AT THE RIGHT TIME. TOO MUCH OF EITHER WOULD HAVE A HARMFUL EFFECT ON THE FRUIT PRODUCED.
